Html:
Hi,

I had created a issue tracker: http://smtp4dev.codeplex.com/workitem/7515

But that has evoked no reposnose, so posting in Discussions .... please excuse the spam.

I am using smtp4dev on a Windows 7/ XP OS.

Is the user required to have admin privileges ? I think not, but

1. It works fine on my machine (where I full admin privileges) 

2. It launches (can see the pop windiow and icon in system tray), but send mail to localhost:25 does not work (even a telnet localhost 25) does not work.

please help diagnose.
